dict.acceptation: 发现；碰见；撞见；获得知识；

sent.orig: We also accept VISA, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover on our secure web server.
sent.trans: 我们也接受VISA,万事达，美国运通和Discover对我们的安全Web服务器。

sent.orig: Payment Policy: PayPal: Auction payments accepted via Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover and E-Check via Paypal.
sent.trans: 付款政策：贝宝：通过维萨，万事达，美国运通，Discover和电子支票通过Paypal接受的拍卖款项。

sent.orig: Prosperity doth best discover vice, but adversity doth best discover virtue.
sent.trans: 顺境时显陋习，逆境时见美德。

sent.orig: Prosperity doth best discover vice, but adversity doth discover virtue.
sent.trans: 顺境时显现恶习，逆境时凸现美德。

sent.orig: Prosperity doth best discover vice; adversity doth best discover virtue.
sent.trans: 顺境暴露恶习，逆境凸显美德。
